array.string: Have you just become ELITE? Have you smashed the biggest party of Thargoids ever? Or have you any other reason to celebrate? Here's the way to do it! A display of fireworks will be arranged solely for you by the station master right in front of the station. Just launch and enjoy your personal fireworks!

Enjoyed your fireworks? This is the portable version. Just carry one of these pylon-mounted devices with you and use it whenever you feel like celebrating! It is launched like a mine, has no destructive power, and is used purely for displays of joy.
The Fireworks Missile is a blank missile fitted with smaller blanks. It has no destructive power, and is used purely for displays of joy.
